title: Comedy, Romance Movie | Lonely Wives | Edward Everett Horton, Esther Ralston

sources.title: Comedy, Romance Movie | Lonely Wives | Edward Everett Horton, Esther Ralston
sources.description:
A lonely husband whose wife has been away hires a lookalike impersonator to fill his place and fool his mother-in-law while he plays around with a pretty coquette. Confusion prevails when his wife returns that evening.

Director: Russell Mack
Writers: A.H. Woods, Walter DeLeon
Stars: Edward Everett Horton, Esther Ralston, Laura La Plante
Genre: Comedy, Romance
